Articles.Content:
Hello, I am Miniboyss, the leader of the Phantom Eagle Industries. We are a fairly new company that started on April 15, 2013. We specialize in unmanned orbital satellites. We also make jets and planes that can safely and easily fly throughout Kerbin and land in water safely (see our X-Jet line). We have also made a few rovers. All of ships are completely stock parts and will run best in 19.1.54 (currently the newest version of KSP).

Satellites:

Phantom Eagle orbital satellite- The first satellite to be successfully launched into orbit by Phantom Eagle Industries. It has a very interesting design with several solar panels placed around it. It is currently orbiting the sun with equipped with an advance SAS module, 3 place-anywhere-rcs thrusters with 4x symmetry, and many communication dishes and antennas. It also has a 2HOT thermometer and several other measuring devices. Due to a mis-calculation, it is currently orbiting the sun.

Phantom Eagle communications Satellite- This is a much more light-weight satellite that has 2, long solar panels. It has several batteries, 5 antennas, and 4 satellite dishes to communicate with Kerbin along with a 2HOT thermometer. Currently orbiting Kerbin.

Phantom Eagle deep-space satellite- A very wide satellite that has a high orbit around kerbin, it has 2 small truss beams with several dishes and antennas on them along with 2 long solar panels.

Rovers:

Phantom Eagle Ion Transporter- This transporter that can hold 3 kerbals runs completely on electricity, it has a huge power supply and can travel at very high speeds due to its light-weight design and 3 ion thrusters, it has several solar panels and geothermal generators for to recharge quickly. Not to mention it is very durable, it can easily conquer downhill and uphill sloped without breaking, it also has a parachute in the event of an emergency.

Planes:

Phantom Eagle micro-Jet- An extremely small one pilot jet capable of getting into the air without the need to press any button! Because of its design, it leans so that the pilot tip is facing up at an angle so that when the engine activates it will rise into the air on its own! It has a small amount of fuel and is normally used as an emergency escape pod if Phantom Eagle is ever attacked.

I will add pictures soon.

Downloads:

You can download the entire save file with all of our .craft and our persistent file here.

Download as .zip

Thanks!

Edited May 4, 2013 by Miniboyss
fixed the photo and added a plane
Also, I'm not very familiar with asparagus staging, but I am learning it slowly!
UPDATE: Working on a new plane called the sky blade, it is a huge plane capable of flying around kerbin and back!
